name: Transformers: Dark of the Moon Decepticons
name_original: Transformers: Dark of the Moon Decepticons
description:
It has been three years since MEGATRON and the DECEPTICONS last threatened the world. Earth's leaders believe that MEGATRON has fled the planet in defeat-but OPTIMUS PRIME knows better. An alien transmission is intercepted, exposing MEGATRON'S plan to spread chaos and fear among the humans, and unleash the ultimate DECEPTICON assasin: SHOCKWAVE! The AUTOBOTS must hunt MEGATRON, neutralize SHOCKWAVE, and sve their new home from total destruction at the hands of the DECEPTICONS.

Features

- Harness the power of stealth force and engage in epic vehicular combat
- Battle against your friends in DS wireless play
- Wage war against the AUTOBOTS as MEGATRON, CROWBAR, SOUNDWAVE, and LOCKDOWN
